ComicInfo.Title: Chapter One: Intro; Chapter Two: Skydiving
ComicInfo.Summary:
Skin & Earth is a story of a girl looking for hope in a hopeless world. Enaia Jin, one of the “pinks”, is caught between romance and cults, gods and mortals, and just trying to find a good borscht. Falling for a new lover, she is lead down a dark path that reveals a twisted fantasy and her own true nature. What is it about Enaia that is so special? Set in a post apocalyptic future, this adventurous tale of loneliness, deceit and self discovery begins here!
Written and drawn by alt-pop phenomenon Lights, Skin & Earth ties directly into her next full length album, released in Fall 2017 on Warner Bros Records.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Lights | 1 | B | Cover B | Lights | 2 |
